name: Snowflake
descriptions: Snowflake is a ghoul stylist who lives in Underworld in 2277.
Snowflake previously lived in Rivet City, but was kicked out a few years ago after he began to transform into a ghoul.
When the Lone Wanderer interacts with him, he is delighted by the possibility to perform a haircut on a full head of human hair, and would enthusiastically do so for free if given the opportunity.
He will cut the player character's hair for free, as he is happy about the fact that he will have "a full head of hair" to work with.

topics.response_text: Oh... OH! Hey! Look at that! A human! With hair! Hey... you think we can do something about that?

topics.topic_text: What can you tell me about Mister Crowley?
topics.response_text: I know he doesn't sell Jet. Bastard.

topics.topic_text: Are you taking Jet over here?
topics.response_text: Well... yeah. So? What else do I have to do except get high?
Yeah, man! That's what I do! I cut hair!

topics.topic_text: You stay away from my hair.
topics.response_text: Oh, c'mon! I don't ever get to work on an actual human!
Now we're talking! What do you need?

topics.topic_text: How does a Ghoul end up as a barber?
topics.response_text: I prefer "stylist" myself, but whatever works for you. Everyone has a gift, you know?
